trans-unit.source: Provides an iterator over a selected set of nodes.
trans-unit.target: Предоставляет итератор по выбранному набору узлов.

trans-unit.source: An XPathNodeIterator object returned by the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> class is not positioned on the first node in a selected set of nodes.
trans-unit.target: XPathNodeIterator объектом, возвращаемым <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>класс находится не на первом узле в выбранном наборе узлов.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: A call to the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.MoveNext%2A> method of the XPathNodeIterator class must be made to position the XPathNodeIterator object on the first node in the selected set of nodes.
trans-unit.target: Вызов <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.MoveNext%2A>метод класса XPathNodeIterator должны быть сделаны поместите объект XPathNodeIterator на первый узел в выбранном наборе узлов.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.MoveNext%2A>

trans-unit.source: When using the XPathNodeIterator, if you edit the current node or any of its ancestors, your current position is lost.
trans-unit.target: При использовании XPathNodeIterator, если изменение текущего узла или его родительских элементов, теряется вашей текущей позиции.

trans-unit.source: If you want to edit a number of nodes that you have selected, create a <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> array, copy all of the nodes from the XPathNodeIterator into the array, then iterate through the array and modify the nodes.
trans-unit.target: Если вы хотите изменить количество узлов, выбранных, создайте <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>массива, скопировать все узлы из XPathNodeIterator в массив, а затем перебора массива и изменять узлы.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: There are two ways to iterate over an <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> collection by using the XPathNodeIterator class.
trans-unit.target: Существует два способа для прохода по <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>коллекции с помощью класса XPathNodeIterator.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: One way is to use the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.MoveNext%2A> method and then call <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.Current%2A> to get the current <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> instance, as in the following example: [!code-cs[XPathNavigatorMethods#55](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.xml.xpath.xpath_1_1.cs)] [!code-vb[XPathNavigatorMethods#55](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.xml.xpath.xpath_1_1.vb)] [!code-cpp[XPathNavigatorMethods#55](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/t-system.xml.xpath.xpath_1_1.cpp)] Another way is to use a `foreach` loop to call the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.GetEnumerator%2A> method and use the returned <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> interface to enumerate the nodes, as in the following example: [!code-cs[XPathNavigatorMethods#56](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.xml.xpath.xpath_1_2.cs)] [!code-vb[XPathNavigatorMethods#56](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.xml.xpath.xpath_1_2.vb)] [!code-cpp[XPathNavigatorMethods#56](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/t-system.xml.xpath.xpath_1_2.cpp)] You should either use <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.MoveNext%2A> and <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.Current%2A> or use <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.GetEnumerator%2A>.
trans-unit.target: One way is to use the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.MoveNext%2A> method and then call <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.Current%2A> to get the current <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> instance, as in the following example: [!code-cs[XPathNavigatorMethods#55](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.xml.xpath.xpath_1_1.cs)] [!code-vb[XPathNavigatorMethods#55](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.xml.xpath.xpath_1_1.vb)] [!code-cpp[XPathNavigatorMethods#55](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/t-system.xml.xpath.xpath_1_1.cpp)] Another way is to use a `foreach` loop to call the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.GetEnumerator%2A> method and use the returned <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> interface to enumerate the nodes, as in the following example: [!code-cs[XPathNavigatorMethods#56](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.xml.xpath.xpath_1_2.cs)] [!code-vb[XPathNavigatorMethods#56](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.xml.xpath.xpath_1_2.vb)] [!code-cpp[XPathNavigatorMethods#56](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/t-system.xml.xpath.xpath_1_2.cpp)] You should either use <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.MoveNext%2A> and <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.Current%2A> or use <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.GetEnumerator%2A>.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.GetEnumerator%2A></xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.Current%2A></xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.MoveNext%2A></xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator></xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.GetEnumerator%2A></xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator></xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.Current%2A></xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.MoveNext%2A>

trans-unit.source: Combining these two approaches can cause unexpected results.
trans-unit.target: Объединение этих двух подходов может привести к непредвиденным результатам.

trans-unit.source: For example, if the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.MoveNext%2A> method is called first, and then the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.GetEnumerator%2A> method is called in the `foreach` loop, the `foreach` loop will not start enumerating the results from the beginning of the collection, but from the position after the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.Current%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Например если <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.MoveNext%2A>сначала вызывается метод и затем <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.GetEnumerator%2A>вызове метода `foreach` цикла, `foreach` цикла не начнется перечисление результатов в начало коллекции, но начиная с позиции после <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.Current%2A>метод.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.Current%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.GetEnumerator%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.MoveNext%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Инициализирует новый экземпляр <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator"> </xref> класса.

trans-unit.source: This constructor is called by derived class constructors to initialize state in this type.
trans-unit.target: Данный конструктор вызывается конструкторами производных классов для инициализации состояния данного типа.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, returns a clone of this <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: При переопределении в производном классе, возвращает клон данного объекта <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator"> </xref> объекта.

trans-unit.source: The cloned <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator> object is positioned at the same node in the node set if calls have been made to the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.MoveNext%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Клонированный <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator>объект располагается в том же узле, в набор, если вызовы выполнялись для узлов <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.MoveNext%2A>метод.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.MoveNext%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator>

trans-unit.source: The cloned <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator> object is not affected by subsequent changes to this <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator> object.
trans-unit.target: Клонированный <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator>последующие изменения не влияет на объект <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator>объекта.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator>

trans-unit.source: A new <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator"></xref> object clone of this <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Новый <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator"> </xref> клон данного объекта <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator"> </xref> объекта.

trans-unit.source: Gets the index of the last node in the selected set of nodes.
trans-unit.target: Получает индекс последнего узла в выбранном наборе узлов.

trans-unit.source: The Count property does not affect the position of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator>.
trans-unit.target: Свойство Count не влияет на положение <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator>.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator>

trans-unit.source: The index of the last node in the selected set of nodes, or 0 if there are no selected nodes.
trans-unit.target: Индекс последнего узла в выбранном наборе узлов, или 0, если нет выбранных узлов.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> object for this <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator"></xref>, positioned on the current context node.
trans-unit.target: При переопределении в производном классе получает <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> для этого объекта <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator"> </xref>, размещенного в контексте текущего узла.

trans-unit.source: You can use the properties of the returned <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> object to obtain information on the current node.
trans-unit.target: Можно использовать свойства возвращаемого <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>объекта, чтобы получить сведения о текущем узле.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: However, the returned <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> object should not be modified.
trans-unit.target: Тем не менее возвращенный <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>объекта не может изменяться.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: The returned <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> object cannot be moved away from the selected node set.
trans-unit.target: Возвращенный <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>объекта не может быть перемещен из набора выбранных узлов.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can clone the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> object using the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Clone%2A> method of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> class.
trans-unit.target: Кроме того можно клонировать <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>объект с помощью <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Clone%2A>метода <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>класса.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Clone%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: The cloned <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> object can then be moved away from the selected node set.
trans-unit.target: Клонированный <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>объект затем могут быть перемещены из набора выбранных узлов.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: This method of cloning the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> object might affect the performance of the XPath query.
trans-unit.target: Этот метод клонирования <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>объекта может повлиять на производительность запроса XPath.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.SelectAncestors%2A>, <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.SelectDescendants%2A>, and <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.SelectChildren%2A> methods result in no nodes being selected, the Current property might not be pointing to the context node.
trans-unit.target: Если <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.SelectAncestors%2A>, <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.SelectDescendants%2A>, и <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.SelectChildren%2A>метода приводят к не возвращают выделенных узлов, текущее свойство не указывает контекстного узла.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.SelectChildren%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.SelectDescendants%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.SelectAncestors%2A>

trans-unit.source: To test whether nodes have been selected, use the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.Count%2A> property as shown in the following example.
trans-unit.target: Чтобы проверить правильность выбранных узлов, используйте <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.Count%2A>Свойства, как показано в следующем примере.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.Count%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> object positioned on the context node from which the node set was selected.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> Объект, расположенный в узле контекста, из которого был выбран набор узлов.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.MoveNext*> method must be called to move the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator"></xref> to the first node in the selected set.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.MoveNext*>Метод должен вызываться для перемещения <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator"> </xref> на первый узел в выбранном наборе.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.MoveNext*>

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the index of the current position in the selected set of nodes.
trans-unit.target: При переопределении в производном классе, возвращает индекс текущей позиции в выбранном наборе узлов.

trans-unit.source: The index is 1-based.
trans-unit.target: Индекс начинается с 1.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the first node has an index of 1.
trans-unit.target: Таким образом первый узел имеет индекс 1.

trans-unit.source: An index of 0 indicates there are no selected nodes.
trans-unit.target: Индекс 0 указывает, что нет выбранных узлов.

trans-unit.source: This property always returns a positive integer.
trans-unit.target: Это свойство всегда возвращает положительное целое число.

trans-unit.source: The index of the current position.
trans-unit.target: Индекс текущей позиции.

trans-unit.source: Returns an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> object to iterate through the selected node set.
trans-unit.target: Возвращает <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>объектов для перечисления элементов на выбранный набор узлов.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: The enumerator is positioned on the current position of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator> object.
trans-unit.target: Перечислитель помещается в текущую позицию <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator>объекта.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator>

trans-unit.source: There are two ways to iterate over an <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> collection by using the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator> class.
trans-unit.target: Существует два способа для прохода по <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>коллекции с помощью <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator>класса.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: One way is to use the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.MoveNext%2A> method and then call <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.Current%2A> to get the current <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> instance, as in the following example: [!code-cs[XPathNavigatorMethods#55](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/m-system.xml.xpath.xpath_41_1.cs)] [!code-vb[XPathNavigatorMethods#55](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/m-system.xml.xpath.xpath_41_1.vb)] [!code-cpp[XPathNavigatorMethods#55](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/m-system.xml.xpath.xpath_41_1.cpp)] Another way is to use a `foreach` loop to call the GetEnumerator method and use the returned <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> interface to enumerate the nodes, as in the following example: [!code-cs[XPathNavigatorMethods#56](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/m-system.xml.xpath.xpath_41_2.cs)] [!code-vb[XPathNavigatorMethods#56](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/m-system.xml.xpath.xpath_41_2.vb)] [!code-cpp[XPathNavigatorMethods#56](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/m-system.xml.xpath.xpath_41_2.cpp)] You should either use the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.MoveNext%2A> method and <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.Current%2A> or use the GetEnumerator method.
trans-unit.target: One way is to use the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.MoveNext%2A> method and then call <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.Current%2A> to get the current <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> instance, as in the following example: [!code-cs[XPathNavigatorMethods#55](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/m-system.xml.xpath.xpath_41_1.cs)][!code-vb[XPathNavigatorMethods#55](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/m-system.xml.xpath.xpath_41_1.vb)][!code-cpp[XPathNavigatorMethods#55](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/m-system.xml.xpath.xpath_41_1.cpp)] Another way is to use a `foreach` loop to call the GetEnumerator method and use the returned <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> interface to enumerate the nodes, as in the following example: [!code-cs[XPathNavigatorMethods#56](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/m-system.xml.xpath.xpath_41_2.cs)][!code-vb[XPathNavigatorMethods#56](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/m-system.xml.xpath.xpath_41_2.vb)][!code-cpp[XPathNavigatorMethods#56](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/m-system.xml.xpath.xpath_41_2.cpp)] You should either use the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.MoveNext%2A>метод и <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.Current%2A>или используйте метод GetEnumerator.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.Current%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.MoveNext%2A> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.Current%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.MoveNext%2A>

trans-unit.source: Combining these two approaches can cause unexpected results.
trans-unit.target: Объединение этих двух подходов может привести к непредвиденным результатам.

trans-unit.source: For example, if the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.MoveNext%2A> method is called first, and then the GetEnumerator method is called in the `foreach` loop, the `foreach` loop will not start enumerating the results from the beginning of the collection, but from the position after the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.Current%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Например если <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.MoveNext%2A>сначала вызывается метод, а затем вызывает сбой метода GetEnumerator `foreach` цикла, `foreach` цикла не начнется перечисление результатов в начало коллекции, но начиная с позиции после <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.Current%2A>метод.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.Current%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.MoveNext%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> object to iterate through the selected node set.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>Объектов для перечисления элементов на выбранный набор узлов.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, moves the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> object returned by the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.Current*> property to the next node in the selected node set.
trans-unit.target: При переопределении в производном классе перемещает <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> объект, возвращаемый <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.Current*>свойство к следующему узлу в выбранный набор узлов.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.Current*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator> object is positioned on the first node in the selected node set only after the initial call to the MoveNext method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator>Объект располагается на первом узле в выбранном узле задайте только после начальной вызова в метод MoveNext.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator>

trans-unit.source: The node set is created in document order.
trans-unit.target: Набор узлов создается в порядке документа.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, calling the MoveNext method moves to the next node in document order.
trans-unit.target: Таким образом вызвав метод MoveNext метод перемещается на следующий узел в порядке документа.

trans-unit.source: There are two ways to iterate over an <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> collection by using the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator> class.
trans-unit.target: Существует два способа для прохода по <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>коллекции с помощью <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator>класса.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: One way is to use the MoveNext method and then call <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.Current%2A> to get the current <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> instance, as in the following example: [!code-cs[XPathNavigatorMethods#55](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/m-system.xml.xpath.xpath_3_1.cs)] [!code-vb[XPathNavigatorMethods#55](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/m-system.xml.xpath.xpath_3_1.vb)] [!code-cpp[XPathNavigatorMethods#55](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/m-system.xml.xpath.xpath_3_1.cpp)] Another way is to use a `foreach` loop to call the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.GetEnumerator%2A> method and use the returned <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> interface to enumerate the nodes, as in the following example: [!code-cs[XPathNavigatorMethods#56](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/m-system.xml.xpath.xpath_3_2.cs)] [!code-vb[XPathNavigatorMethods#56](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/m-system.xml.xpath.xpath_3_2.vb)] [!code-cpp[XPathNavigatorMethods#56](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/m-system.xml.xpath.xpath_3_2.cpp)] You should either use the MoveNext method and <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.Current%2A> or use the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.GetEnumerator%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: One way is to use the MoveNext method and then call <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.Current%2A> to get the current <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> instance, as in the following example: [!code-cs[XPathNavigatorMethods#55](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/m-system.xml.xpath.xpath_3_1.cs)][!code-vb[XPathNavigatorMethods#55](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/m-system.xml.xpath.xpath_3_1.vb)][!code-cpp[XPathNavigatorMethods#55](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/m-system.xml.xpath.xpath_3_1.cpp)] Another way is to use a `foreach` loop to call the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.GetEnumerator%2A> method and use the returned <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> interface to enumerate the nodes, as in the following example: [!code-cs[XPathNavigatorMethods#56](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/m-system.xml.xpath.xpath_3_2.cs)][!code-vb[XPathNavigatorMethods#56](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/m-system.xml.xpath.xpath_3_2.vb)][!code-cpp[XPathNavigatorMethods#56](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/m-system.xml.xpath.xpath_3_2.cpp)] You should either use the MoveNext метод и <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.Current%2A>или используйте <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.GetEnumerator%2A>метод.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.GetEnumerator%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.Current%2A> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.GetEnumerator%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.Current%2A>

trans-unit.source: Combining these two approaches can cause unexpected results.
trans-unit.target: Объединение этих двух подходов может привести к непредвиденным результатам.

trans-unit.source: For example, if the MoveNext method is called first, and then the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.GetEnumerator%2A> method is called in the `foreach` loop, the `foreach` loop will not start enumerating the results from the beginning of the collection, but from the position after the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.Current%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Например, если сначала вызывается метод MoveNext и затем <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.GetEnumerator%2A>вызове метода `foreach` цикла, `foreach` цикла не начнется перечисление результатов в начало коллекции, но начиная с позиции после <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.Current%2A>метод.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.Current%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.GetEnumerator%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> object moved to the next node; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if there are no more selected nodes.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Если <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> объект перемещен к следующему узлу; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> Если выделенных узлов больше нет.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new object that is a copy of the current instance.
trans-unit.target: Создает новый объект, являющийся копией текущего экземпляра.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Этот член представляет явную реализацию члена интерфейса.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator> instance is cast to an <xref:System.ICloneable> interface.
trans-unit.target: Он может использоваться только если <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator>экземпляр приводится к <xref:System.ICloneable>интерфейс.</xref:System.ICloneable> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator>

trans-unit.source: A new object that is a copy of this instance.
trans-unit.target: Новый объект, являющийся копией этого экземпляра.
